website_summaries.verdict: A premium refrigerator filter that eliminates over 99% of harmful contaminants from water.
pros: Filter eliminates contaminants from up to 300 gallons of water
Designed for fast, seamless installation every 6 months
NSF- and WQA-certified for chlorine, bad taste and odor removal
Works great with a broad array of refrigerators
cons: May need to be replaced more frequently than many comparable filters

customer_reviews.title: Works in Samsung French-d from Lowe’s
customer_reviews.text: Using these in a Samsung French door type from Lowe’s. Seems to work fine. Initially had trouble installing but it was alignment, then just needed a good push and it wound right in place. These had the double seal like in the pictures, and like some have said the hole is a bit larger than the oem one. No leaks. Working well. And do run a gallon or so through it. You can see the powder debris in the first few cups of water. Then all is clear.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Filter and VERY Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the 3-pack filters and the amazingly quick delivery. Clearly a high-quality product at a very competitive price. The filter worked perfectly in my refrigerator. Sealed without any leaks. Plus, I couldn't believe how quickly they arrived...even by today's standard. I will order these filters again and would recommend them without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: It is a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Filter fits fine, but removing old filter and installing new one is difficult due to water pressure. Manual says to cut off water supply to refrigerator if this is a problem, but moving my refrigerator to cut off the water supply is more of a problem. Regardless, there is no problem with the filter - the fit is fine. I will reorder when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: As many reviews mentioned, the cost of one Samsung filter is $50+. So the thought of 3 for half that price, sounds too good to be true. I purchased these filters last week, removed about a gallon and a half and I'm very happy with the outcome. My two main concerns were water quality and the rate at which the water dispensed. I've bought a 'knock off' brand in the past and though the water tasted fine, it seemed to take forever to fill a glass. From my experience with the Icepure filter, water tastes just fine and it dispenses like the Samsung filter did. So in my opinion, a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Torrey

customer_reviews.title: run a gallon through before using it
customer_reviews.text: it had some weird residue until a gallon had gone through. just like the directions said.("run a gallon through the filter before using it.") cant beat the price on the three pack and they arrived quickly. no chlorine smell and no more bottled water. awesome
customer_reviews.author: justuff

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I hope. The brand name filters are very expensive. Since I have a pre-filter on the line to the fridge I an not worried about their longevity as long as there are no bits of charcoal int the ice cubes or water. This sould be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Behrent

customer_reviews.title: These arrived really quickly. I just popped one in ...
customer_reviews.text: These arrived really quickly. I just popped one in. Purchasing the multi makes it very convenient when I need to replace my filter when it's time. No going out and having to find one. Plus it costs less
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B.

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought a three pack of water filters from Ice Pure for my Samsung 3 door frig 18 months ago. These first three have worked great...an exact replacement for the Samsung OEM filters but half the price. I just ordered a second three pack, not even considering Samsung's.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, perfect fit. I had my reservations whether it would fit or not. Samsung makes it tough to know what filter will fit. They make you want to by there filters for 3 times the price. So glad I found a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Significant Cost Savings
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical in the prices for three filters being much less than one brand name filter. I read the review, the good, the bad and in-between and decided to take a chance. I'm glad I did. We did make sure we got a good seal when installing and the filter has been installed about a month now with no issues. Believe when they say to run water through or you will get nasty tasting water.
customer_reviews.author: NeNe

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Picture only shows 2 boxes of the 3 because one is already installed. Boxes are sealed with a UV Sterilized sticker. Each individual canister in each box is also sealed in plastic. Followed the instructions for proper flushing once installed. Easy process. Water tastes a lot better than our regular tap water once ready to use. I highly recommend this product as an alternative to more expensive brands! Product exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: According to the guy who repaired our Samsung Refrigerator, he said these filters were the best bang for the buck. According to him, they don’t filter quite as good as the Samsung brand, but he explained to me that the difference in filtration is negligible. We were paying $50 for the Samsung filters at Lowe’s, but now we can purchase this 3 pack for a cheaper price, and they work just as good in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Cross-eyed catTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: IcePure Waterfilter - Quality Product at a lower price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased that I ordered the IcePure Water filter three pack. It is an outstanding value, a perfect fit, easy to install and they last as long as the original Samsung filter (6 months each). I plan to purchase these again when my three pack runs out. Can't tell the difference between the IcePure filter and the original Samsung filter, other than Samsung's higher price. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: Fits & works great good price
customer_reviews.text: Filter fits perfectly, no leaks so far, working well, has been installed in our Samsung French door refrigerator for a week. We do not have water dispenser so it is used only for an ice maker, working fine. Would purchase again, price is great! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K.Valerioti

customer_reviews.title: Works with our Samsung Refridgerator.
customer_reviews.text: Love this water filter, as we had no issues with it. We bought one from another company that said it worked with ours, but It only had one rubber ring, whereas, with our model, the old one had two. This one works, Look closely before you purchase a new water filter to make sure it is like the one you are replacing. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Txmacuser

customer_reviews.title: Ours works
customer_reviews.text: We have been tired of forking our $50+ twice a year for Samsung filters, so we tried these. We have a 2016 Chef's Collection four-door unit, and these seem to be working just fine after a week. Even if they do not work quite as well--and any taste difference would be negligible from our perspective--the huge price difference weighs heavily. If your unit is compatible, give these a try--it is not a huge gamble.
customer_reviews.author: chchon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaged great . My Samsung refrigerator stopped making ice so upon researching I decided to try and change the filter . Samsung filters are double and even triple the cost of these so I decided to give it a try . They worked great . Easy installation . It corrected the problem and my ice is now producing again
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca wilson

customer_reviews.title: Have these for when I need them next.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be a perfect replacement for the much more expensive Samsung part. I have installed the last of my previous order and I guess these will be used in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Loring C

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit model RF32FMQDBSR/AA
customer_reviews.text: For information not accurate. The hole on top is too large in this version (first photo), compared to the one I had installed previously (see second photo showing two). I checked fit info using the Amazon tool for model number: RF32FMQDBSR/AA and that said it matched but still did not fit...
customer_reviews.author: Raghu Chandrasekaran

customer_reviews.title: Has a bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the bad taste would go away but after a month its still bad. I wish I would have not waisted my money on this product . I did read some bad reviews that have the same comment but I thought that they were just complainers. They were right. I wouldn't by this product. No Good!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: It Works!  And the quality is good too...
customer_reviews.text: When you purchase a generic brand of anything, you lessen your expectations. This water filter, however, far exceeded my expectations. Excellent packaging, clear and professional instructions, and all the necessary certifications that point to an high quality product. But when you get right down to it, the price is unbelieveable. I had no problem installing the filter, I flushed it per the instructions, and did not observe any leaks. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I can't rate the performance yet. I feel that when I reorder, however, it will rate 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: davisg13

customer_reviews.title: The water also tasted funny. I normally buy the cheaper alternative option
customer_reviews.text: They leaked in my fridge. I sent back and they refunded, but leaked all over the inside of my fridge within 24 hours of installing. I saw multiple reviews saying this too. The water also tasted funny. I normally buy the cheaper alternative option, not worth it in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 3-pack earlier in 2019 just after installing my last Samsung brand water filter. Changed out filter this morning and find that the new filter allows steady drip from water dispenser in fridge. Samsung brand only allowed 1-2 drips after releasing the switch. The Icepure Pro filter initially allows a short, steady stream at the moment the switch is released, then a steady drip every few seconds from then on. Never had this problem with the name brand filters. Guess I don't get to realize a savings in cost like I thought I would. Would NOT recommend this product for your Samsung refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Passes the taste test
customer_reviews.text: I've used these before and I'm coming back for more. To me a water filter is a just a water filter...not a big deal. But these pass the taste test with my girlfriend who drinks Evian all the time and that's what counts for me.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: 3 for the price of 1/2
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've used these filters for my refrigerator. They're easy to install, they work well and I would very definitely recommend. I'm not sure how to rate the "flavor" as there is no flavor, which means that the filters are working! They replace the name brand filter that the manufacturer prices at $53. I get it's a nice refrigerator, but there is no way to justify $53 every six months.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A Ascenzi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for my fridge
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding price on a three pack of these filters! The come individually packaged to keep them neat and clean. Quick insert, and twist to lock in on my Samsung fridge. Each filter comes with a date sticker to remind you of when you installed them, of you can use the date as a change by date...Water tastes great, clean ice cubes from the freezer. Will be stocking up on more of these later.
customer_reviews.author: TJ McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these in the past and have trouble fitting the filters in my Samsung refrigerator. Sometimes it fits and sometimes it doesn't. This pack however, none of the 3 filters fit at all. So $25 down the drain, because I ordered them a few months ago and did not need to replace filter until now. I am going to try to return to seller, I doubt they will take them back. It's not fair though, because it can be months before you actually need to use one..
customer_reviews.author: mezzaluna508

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I installed one of these in our Samsung fridge (RF22KREDBSG/AA) a few days ago and so far have not experienced any issues with it. The seal seems fine. The filter does require you run about 2 gallons of water through it before it comes out clear but that's what Samsung says to do with their filter too. Since it started coming out clear, the water tastes just as good as with the Samsung filter and these are quite less expensive! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: T. Niver

customer_reviews.title: We could not drink the water out of this filter
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a filter that cost less than $50/ea and we were excited to find these! However, we could not get past the taste. Honestly just not drinkable unless you were used to drinking extremely bad water already. It's not a chemical taste.. it's like a rotten fish taste - terrible. We ran many gallons through each filter trying to get the taste out, but it just didn't work. We ended up throwing all 3 of these filters away and going back to Lowes and buying the $50 filter...
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Once I verified these filters would fit my newer Samsung refrigerator I placed the order and they arrived just a couple of days later. Installation was an absolute breeze with zero leakage. After running a gallon or so of water through the filter it was good to go. We have great water but the taste actually improved with the new filter. The one it replaced was over a year old. I would highly recommend this product and vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Randall W. Hannaway

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good fit Samsung Refrigerator RFG298HDRS/XAA Rev 02
customer_reviews.text: This was quick and easy replacement for my Samsung Refrigerator RFG298HDRS/XAA Rev 02 Replacement - Water-Filter DA29-00020B Trick, don't set the old filter down on the counter, put in the sink for it to drain. smile. I replaced this with no water issues. 1 drop ...except when I put the old one on the counter. No leaks, Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Broadband

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit in Samsung Fridge Replacing Samsung DA2900020B-1 Filter
customer_reviews.text: The description says the filter is a replacement for Samsung DA2900020B, but it won't fit as a replacement for the Samsung DA2900020B-1. I bought this 3 pack shortly after I got my fridge; unfortunately, the return window closed before I needed to replace the filter. Now I'm stuck with 3 filters that don't fit my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Calpolypat

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, can't beat the price. The reason for 3 stars is I don't think it filters as well as the Samsung filters, although it may be fine for places where water isn't as hard. I live in Hawaii and we have really hard water, lot of mineral deposits. Using these filters i noticed a lot more of the white residue on my ice/water dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: CMA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: But this filter made my water taste terrible. I thought maybe it just needed to be flushed out so I ran the water through it for about a gallon of water and the taste was still terrible...
customer_reviews.author: Dajian

customer_reviews.title: I’d order it again.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and initially received only 1 of the 3 filters. I was eager to use the new filter right away so I planned to eat the cost of the other 2. I wrote a review about that experience and was contacted by their customer service. She completely took care of me. Great customer service. As far as the filter goes, I have no complaints the water is much better quality than it had been. I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the chlorine smell from my city water supply.
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered fast, even during quarantine! First time I used this brand. They were easy to install and fit like factory. Ran about 8 quarts of water thru them before drinking. Taste as good as the other brand I was using. Every few months my city goes a little to heavy on the chlorine in our water. I can smell it from the faucets and the shower. No chlorine smell or taste detected after water was filtered with this filter. 2 thumbs up on fit, quality, value and shipping!👍👍
customer_reviews.author: PedsMurse33322

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price and water quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: So far with all the filter brands I have purchased. Including the Samsung brand water filter. This has been my favorite. It was a few $ more then the others that I have been looking at but I feel like why change something that meets their description. The water is so refreshing with no bad taste or smell. Will continue purchasing this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hj 808

customer_reviews.title: Zero star rating.
customer_reviews.text: The filter leaked and costed me a visit from an appliance technician. I had water all over the floor this morning and initially couldn't identify the source of the water. I ended up calling an appliance technician ($80 trip charge and $18/15 minutes). After some troubleshooting, he identified the the source of the leak was the ice pure water filter. I had an old filter and put that one back in and the water stopped leaking. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kubat

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator water filters works great! Just as well as the more expensive brands, and for less. Instructions make it seem that the old filter can be easily removed by grasping it and turning with your hands. But my experience with this an other filters was that I needed pliers to turn/remove the old filter. This is NOT a defect of the product, just difficult to remove without pliers. I recommend this filter!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Whining, bussing sound when dispensing
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would get some generic water filters for my Samsung refrigerator. Mistake!! They seem to be the right fit, but after trying two (of the three) filters they sure don't work that well. There is a constant buzz that I have never had when using Samsung filters. It sound like a swarm of bees are in my fridge. I guess I will return them and go back to paying the high price for filters. It was worth a shot, but I would not recommend unless you are hard of hearing.
customer_reviews.author: MarkH

customer_reviews.title: Filters doing what they do
customer_reviews.text: These were the right filters for my fridge and they work exactly like I hoped they would. They filter water, they don't leak and the extras are in boxes that store nicely in the cabinet above the refrigerator that never gets any other use. When I run out of these I hope they are still available for about this price. Speaking of price these three were the cost of one at the appliance store I purchased the Samsung from originally.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Requires 6 gallon flush to use
customer_reviews.text: When first installed the water was dark, dark gray. The instructions say to flush with 6 gallons of water. Ever tried to run 6 gallons through the small faucet in a refrigerator door? That's a lot of glasses and you can't fit a big container in the small opening in the door. The Samsung filters run clear at the start but are more than 3 times the cost. I'm hoping they are safe to use with the discoloration which is still there a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Pastense11

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slow water flow
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these with the expectation of good performance, but should have paid heed to the reviews that said the flow was slow. The filter installed just fine, but the water flow was just slightly more than a trickle! The hole on the filter was about 1/4 of the size of the filter it replaced!!! We took this filter out and are returning it. Don't waste your time or money on this filter!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen K Scott

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Leaked after first install, just installed 2nd let’s see how it goes. I saw ice building up in in bottom freezer. Cause water leak from filter.
customer_reviews.author: Bhinder Bhinder

customer_reviews.title: They are fully compatible with Samsung refrigerators at almost 80% cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike especially since they installed in seconds and the manufacture's info documents claim that they remove a lot more harmful elements than Samsung's OEM filters. I'm thrilled that i could purchase 3 replacement filters for less than the cost of one OEM filter.
customer_reviews.author: marley_juma

customer_reviews.title: As good as the Samsung water purification filter
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. No different from the original Samsung filter. We have our fridge hooked up to the Reverse Osmosis water purification system, so we use the fridge filter as a taste improver. I measured TDS(total dissolved solids) of the filtered water and the filter didn’t increase the amount of the water impurities. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Damir L.

customer_reviews.title: very tight fit
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to be a lot harder to put in than the filter that my refrigerator came with. When held side by side, they look identical and I can't tell if there is a slight size difference, but I had to use more force than expected to get them to twist in.
customer_reviews.author: Missy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. I buy 3 filters at a time and will continue to do so. I had an issue with a filter and the customer service is excellent. My emails were answered immediately and my problem was addressed and taken care of promptly. Great company, great product and great customer service. They have my business for life.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative compared to the pricey Samsung filters
customer_reviews.text: I got these filters after years of buying the original filters on my Samsung refrigerator so I could save some money and I'm not disappointed at all. The water tastes as good as with the original ones and they've been working great with no leaks at all
customer_reviews.author: proracedriver5

customer_reviews.title: Same filter for less money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace my current fridge water filter. It’s a great replacement, as I got 3 filters for less than I usually pay for one! As easy to install as the original one and does the same thing!! I received them sooner than I was told I would as well. Win win!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend. Definitely better than others I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several different types of generic for my Samsung french door style fridge. These are truly the better ones I've had. The water is way better tasting and less bubbles than others I've used. I bought these on the reviews and item description is 100% accurate.
customer_reviews.author: KRAH

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: My Samsung is a two door two drawer combination with ice and water. The filter that I had been using were Samsung. The ones I just bought are same size and design with two 0 rings. The only difference I see is the center hole is larger with the DA29 0002B. It is working at the time with no leaks. After a few weeks if there are no problems I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Taste of water
customer_reviews.text: I bought simple ice pure filter in the past. That filter had fair filtration but taste of water had some odd. It seem to me chemical smell. This filter paid more and result is better. Filter water is good. No smell and no chemical taste
customer_reviews.author: aml

customer_reviews.title: Good option to factory model
customer_reviews.text: It has an extra o ring that the original doesn't. Be sure to push the cartridge in completely and give it a 1/4 turn to the right. I used a pair of pliers to gently do this. It is the same size and fits perfectly. I don't give it 5 stars as the water pressure is less than an original, but acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Skd

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, but refrigerator makes noises now
customer_reviews.text: Fits my French door Samsung fridge perfectly and I don't taste a difference in water quality. However my fridge is now making a funny gurgling/bubbling sound and I'm not exactly sure where that's coming from. Never had this issue when I was using the original filter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you have a Samsung da29 000b as it is not compatible and will fill your drawer with water it leaks. It cost me $220 to have a Samsung technician come out to let me know that the product only has one gasket on the neck whereas the Samsung filter has two. I bought the Samsung filter and it worked perfectly as it did have two rubber gaskets around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: 3 for the price of 1
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after seeing how ridiculously expensive the Samsung filter was in comparison. These fit perfectly and the water quality is easily as good as the Samsung filter. Pack of three for far less than the OEM Samsung. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nick in Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!! TWO O-RINGS FOR NO-LEAK CONNECTION
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this "Off-brand" water filter for my Samsung refrigerator, after wasting money on a Samsung brand-name water filter that leaked as soon as it was installed. When I installed this water filter there was no leaking. I suspect this was due, in part, to the superior design of this "off-brand" filter compared to the inferior Samsung brand water filter. This "Off-brand" filter is endowed with TWO O-rings at the connector whereas the inferior Samsung brand has only one O-ring. I would recommend this brand water filter to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY JONES

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These filters are easy to install and do what they are supposed to do. Every three or four months, the change filter light comes on. Having a three pack handy keeps me set for a year or so. Take the old one out, slide the new one in, hit the reset button and I'm done. Easy peezy!
customer_reviews.author: Johno

customer_reviews.title: Look no more for Samsung Filters
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Icepure these filters are perfect. I highly recommend these filters for my Samsung refrigerator. Water tastes great and filters are very easy to install. Thanks again for a great product. Subscribe to these they are great !
customer_reviews.author: Fire tablet

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well.
customer_reviews.text: With this Samsung Refrigerator this filter does not work well, even though it read that it work for this refrigerator. The taste of the water is not good.
customer_reviews.author: B.J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in our Samsung fridge
customer_reviews.text: Even though the fridge manual says not to use after market filters with the threat of leaks and voiding the warranty, I still went ahead and tried these filters out. No problems what so ever after 3 years and 6 filters.
customer_reviews.author: AHK

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I've had zero problems with this filter. It lasted just as long as the much more expensive Samsung filter that it replaced. Actually, this is the second order of these filters for me! I had no installation, fitting or leaking problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: ctexhowlin

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement brand for original filter
customer_reviews.text: I was originally purchasing the recommended brand by Samsung at twice the price, but found this brand more affordable. Doesn’t last as long as the original brand (maybe by a month or two) but I find no difference in performance and taste of my water.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mussnug

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worst filter I’ve ever used. Nearly impossible to remove and only lasts about a month. WTer and ice dispensers do no function properly with this filter. When warer run it produces a sound like a jackhammer. I will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: OEM quality for a 3rd of OEM pricing
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical initally on how I could purchase three filters for a 3rd of what one OEM filter costs. Let's say I'm 100% amazed on how well this filter works. My water tastes great! And it comes out crystal clear and faster to. I'll be actually replacing as recommended now unlike before.
customer_reviews.author: COTE

customer_reviews.title: Drilled it to fit it
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars based on price but it did not fit my Samsung refrigerator. I used the Amazon product finder and input my model number and these were supposed to fit, but the hole in the center of the filter was too small to fit my refrigerator. I drilled it out to the size of the old filter 5/32 and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hester

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This filter is horrible! Flooded my entire refrigerator,floor and ceiling below it does not work! I thought perhaps one of the filters was defective so I did not comment until I tried another one and it flooded as well. Do not use this brand! They should be recalled!! The only reason I clicked one star is because it wouldn’t let me hit submit unless I rated the product by clicking on one of the stars. Now I have to go call a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: match my samsung refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: my refrigerator always has a red warning lights about filter. I put this filter in and press reset button for 3 second, now it is changed successfully, it is cheaper than original samsung filter.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing with these is it took running many quarts of water through it to get a clean / clear tasteless water. Once I learned to flush them out, about 2 gallons they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Icepure Refrigerator Water Filter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a box of three and they arrived as scheduled. I installed one and there have not been any issues for the past week. I would purchase these filters again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value, plug and play
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about leakage or the water and ice not tasting as good, but I can't tell a difference between the Samsung original and these, and saved a tremendous amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ex MachinaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit our Samsung refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I made sure that it was the proper filter by going through the seller's checklist. The filters we received look identical to the the Samsung filter (other than graphics) but do not dock into the slot. I'm afraid to push any harder to seat it properly, I don't want to damage the refrigerator. Disappointed since the factory filters are very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: 262X40

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Purchased when I bought my new fridge. 6 months later I go to change my filter and all 3 are cracked and spewing water. Will never purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Great product and filtration for 1/4 of the cost of the OEM ones
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great for the 1.5 years we tried them. Water tastes good, and they filter great. No reason to get Samsung OEM ones vs these as these work just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Filters came well packaged and were simple to install. Be sure to flow water through the filter, post installation, to remove trapped air. Water taste and flow rate are both great after using this replacement filter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Too restrictive
customer_reviews.text: This filter is too restrictive. The pressure drop not only slows filling glasses, but more importantly causes the valve to close too slowly, resulting in a gradual shutoff, where the stream continues after people remove their glass from the filler. The drip tray fills up very quickly. Will not use the remaining 2 cartridges because its too hard to train everyone to hold their glass still for a few seconds after releasing the fill paddle on my Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Village Idiot

customer_reviews.title: Fits well as described and tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Little expensive than other sites but quick shipping and good quality product . I would plan in advance and get a cheaper filter the next time but this one did the job this time
customer_reviews.author: Reeta Raina

customer_reviews.title: No Problems with Taste
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers mentioned they had a strange taste when using this filter, but I did not experience that. The cost of these 3 would have been the same when purchasing just ONE Samsung water filter. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 lemon
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 3 pack of this filter anout 1 year ago. 1st one seemed to work good. 2nd chlorine taste was still present. 3rd one was a lemon, as if the filter was not even installed. Sheet happens I guess. No more of this one for me.
customer_reviews.author: K9Cousin

customer_reviews.title: Save money and buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Work well, no leaks. Water is coming out of the dispenser slow but it's probably a different issue. Icemaker is working fine now. Look at your old filter closely before ordering to make sure its the same kind. I think some people are ordering the wrong filter for there fridge, hence some of the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: theHulq

customer_reviews.title: Shutting off water main not necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Not really necessary to shut off water main as indicated in enclosed instructions. Just watched YouTube video and installation was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: C Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Threw out the first one because it leaked
customer_reviews.text: The first one leaked, so I had to toss it. This brought down the value of the purchase. Second one is in now and does not leak, but it has only been a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Its a water filter. Installation requires some force to push and twist. Instructions are clear. So far it worked as expected at a much lower price than appliance stores would charge.
customer_reviews.author: Merkle

customer_reviews.title: Almost identical and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to the Samsung brand water filter, almost identical.. Installed easily no issues and the water runs smoothly with a good clean water taste.. got three filter for about half the price for a Samsung replacement water filter.. will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Carta

customer_reviews.title: Filter is not working
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 filters. I used the first one and everything went well, I heard a sound of the filter (vacuum) when I installed the product. Then after a few month I tried to instal the second one and the refrigerator light stayed on that the filter needed to be replaced then after a week I tried the third one and the same thing happened. I didn’t hear the sound of the filter while installing. So to me a Waist of money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these filters. They were a fraction of the price of the Samsung name brand ones, and work just as well. Saved me bunches of money. Yay! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Little hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great - was a little harder to install than the manufacturer filter. Just needed to push a little more than I expected. Once installed it works great - will purchase again moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: If I was still within the 30 day refund period, I would return these. I had to take the filter out because I was getting small particles floating in my water. Not what you want to see! Save yourself some money and put it toward a real Samsung filter. You’ll save money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay for the brand name
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly in our 2018 model Samsung side-by-side / freezer on bottom model. Can't imagine paying three or four times as much for the Samsung brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Same filter quality, a lot less expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is the least expensive filter for our refrigerator. I cannot tell the difference from the more expensive options. Great value compared to the competition. I will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Another Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use / good filtering
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice replacement filter. It is well packages yet easy to open. It fits perfectly and does a good job filtering the water.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B

customer_reviews.title: No differece in water quality from OEM
customer_reviews.text: No difference in the taste of the water. Screwed right in with no leakage.. Great price for 3 filters. Every placed I checked water $49..99 and up
customer_reviews.author: Nikta

customer_reviews.title: Get the Amazon basics filters....
customer_reviews.text: It fit the Samsung refrigerator good, easy to install and cheaper than original, but it wasnt long before the water started tasting funny, we actually changed them out for the Amazon basics filters and those seem to work better, water taste good and its really clear
customer_reviews.author: Lou & Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Product fits perfectly to my Samsung refrigerator. Easy to install. Even comes with stickers to attach to water filter if your refrigerator doesn't have an alarm to notify you when it goes bad. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Fit and Work
customer_reviews.text: They fit my fridge and they work so far. Just started using them so I’ll see if they hold up. Much cheaper than OEM.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine.. fridge didn’t recognize it at first but after a few days it did and stop alerting me to change the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Kwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Okay okay
customer_reviews.text: While the product is good for the price. The filter sign does not go away from my fridge and the ice maker works but the water flow is really low. I do not know if its the fridge or the filter but normally the sign goes away once I replace the filter but it did not happen this time with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pramisa Timsina

customer_reviews.title: Save money
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working well but it was a bit difficult to install. But I think it’s a design issue with the model of refrigerator not the product.
customer_reviews.author: C.D

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipping. I installed it in just minutes after going without a functional filter for a long time. The three pack makes sure I don't go without again!
customer_reviews.author: Red 0524
